[ ]:

pulsar1 = peri.pulsar()
pulsar1.mass = 1.25
pulsar1.axis=3E8
pulsar1.ecc=0.5
pulsar1.omega=50
pulsar1.angle=[90.2, 90.4]

[ ]:

peri.amp_plot(pulsar1)

[ ]:

peri.delay_lat(pulsar1)
